body: WHAT THE FUCK is this I feel more disgusted and I didn’t even come to read it but damn trust looking I hope the brother gets cucked
I love rewrites because their dialog is almost always changed to something far dirtier.
Ah, the old days before translators were common so retards would write fanfics on speech bubbles of hentai manga. I don't miss it.

"Let me fuck you and I'll fix you up with all of my pals..."
